display_name: Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale Total Score
description:
Total from the Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale. Range 20 -80 with higher scores indicating less impulsivity. Note: reverse coding for items 1, 4, 5, 7, 12 and 19, where we change 1=4, 2=3, 3=2 and 4=1 before calculating the overall sum. [Cyders et al 2014 (PMID: 24636739)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055534/)

[Search for all Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=upps)
